author: chirino
msg: Fixes APLO-173 : Document how to use the MQTT protocol with Apollo.
Just added an MQTT Publisher / Listener example and re-organized the examples directory structure so that it's organized by protocol.

author: colen
msg: OPENNLP-485: Improved how contractions are handled: some are expanded to more than 2 tokens. Also now we force tokenization of named entities that has punctuations.
